field.name: description
field.value:
After compiling the trunk sources of NH, Castle and Rhino, some code that worked before does not work anymore. The error is about an hql statement that seems right to me and worked. Please advice. Thanks.
Castle.ActiveRecord.Framework.ActiveRecordException: Could not perform ExecuteQuery for Calcul ---> NHibernate.QueryException: '(' expected after HQL function in SELECT
[select new Varianta(c.Angajat.Id,c.IdZona,c.Data,c.IdDepartament,c.Perioada.Id,c.NumeManager,c.IdSchimb,SUM(c.MinutePlanificate),SUM(c.MinutePlanificate*c.CostOrar*100),SUM(c.MinuteInvoiriPlatite),SUM(c.MinuteInvoiriPlatite*c.CostOrar*100),SUM(c.MinuteInvoiriNeplatite),SUM(c.MinuteInvoiriNeplatite*c.CostOrar*100),SUM(c.MinuteLucratePlanificate+c.MinuteAcordateInTimpulProgramului),SUM(c.MinuteLucratePlanificate*c.CostOrar*100+c.MinuteAcordateInTimpulProgramului*c.CostOrar*100),SUM(c.NrIntervaleNeverificate)) from Bionet.Db.Calcul c where c.Firma.Id = :IdFirma and c.Data between :DataStart and :DataStop group by c.IdDepartament,c.Angajat.Id,c.Data,c.IdZona,c.NumeManager,c.Perioada.Id,c.IdSchimb]
at NHibernate.Hql.Classic.SelectParser.Token(String token, QueryTranslator q) in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Hql\Classic\SelectParser.cs:line 157 at NHibernate.Hql.Classic.ClauseParser.Token(String token, QueryTranslator q) in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Hql\Classic\ClauseParser.cs:line 103 at NHibernate.Hql.Classic.ClauseParser.End(QueryTranslator q) in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Hql\Classic\ClauseParser.cs:line 135 at NHibernate.Hql.Classic.PreprocessingParser.End(QueryTranslator q) in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Hql\Classic\PreprocessingParser.cs:line 172 at NHibernate.Hql.Classic.ParserHelper.Parse(IParser p, String text, String seperators, QueryTranslator q) in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Hql\Classic\ParserHelper.cs:line 34 at NHibernate.Hql.Classic.QueryTranslator.Compile() in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Hql\Classic\QueryTranslator.cs:line 312 at NHibernate.Hql.Classic.QueryTranslator.Compile(IDictionary`2 replacements, Boolean scalar) in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Hql\Classic\QueryTranslator.cs:line 276 at NHibernate.Engine.Query.HQLQueryPlan..ctor(String hql, String collectionRole, Boolean shallow, IDictionary`2 enabledFilters, ISessionFactoryImplementor factory) in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Engine\Query\HQLQueryPlan.cs:line 57 at NHibernate.Engine.Query.HQLQueryPlan..ctor(String hql, Boolean shallow, IDictionary`2 enabledFilters, ISessionFactoryImplementor factory) in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Engine\Query\HQLQueryPlan.cs:line 31 at NHibernate.Engine.Query.QueryPlanCache.GetHQLQueryPlan(String queryString, Boolean shallow, IDictionary`2 enabledFilters) in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Engine\Query\QueryPlanCache.cs:line 61 at NHibernate.Impl.AbstractSessionImpl.GetHQLQueryPlan(String query, Boolean shallow) in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Impl\AbstractSessionImpl.cs:line 203 at NHibernate.Impl.AbstractSessionImpl.CreateQuery(String queryString) in d:\InternetTools\NHibernate
hibernate\src\NHibernate\Impl\AbstractSessionImpl.cs:line 188 at Castle.ActiveRecord.Queries.HqlBasedQuery.CreateQuery(ISession session) in d:\InternetTools\Castle\ActiveRecord\Castle.ActiveRecord\Framework\Queries\HqlBasedQuery.cs:line 238 at Castle.ActiveRecord.ActiveRecordBaseQuery.InternalExecute(ISession session) in d:\InternetTools\Castle\ActiveRecord\Castle.ActiveRecord\Framework\Queries\ActiveRecordBaseQuery.cs:line 105 at Castle.ActiveRecord.Queries.SimpleQuery`1.InternalExecute(ISession session) in d:\InternetTools\Castle\ActiveRecord\Castle.ActiveRecord\Framework\Queries\SimpleQuery.Generic.cs:line 165 at Castle.ActiveRecord.ActiveRecordBaseQuery.Castle.ActiveRecord.IActiveRecordQuery.Execute(ISession session) in d:\InternetTools\Castle\ActiveRecord\Castle.ActiveRecord\Framework\Queries\ActiveRecordBaseQuery.cs:line 83 at Castle.ActiveRecord.ActiveRecordBase.ExecuteQuery(IActiveRecordQuery query) in d:\InternetTools\Castle\ActiveRecord\Castle.ActiveRecord\Framework\ActiveRecordBase.cs:line 757 --- End of inner exception stack trace --- at Castle.ActiveRecord.ActiveRecordBase.ExecuteQuery(IActiveRecordQuery query) in d:\InternetTools\Castle\ActiveRecord\Castle.ActiveRecord\Framework\ActiveRecordBase.cs:line 763 at Castle.ActiveRecord.ActiveRecordBase`1.ExecuteQuery2[R](IActiveRecordQuery`1 query) in d:\InternetTools\Castle\ActiveRecord\Castle.ActiveRecord\Framework\ActiveRecordBase.Generic.cs:line 181 at Castle.ActiveRecord.Queries.SimpleQuery`1.Execute() in d:\InternetTools\Castle\ActiveRecord\Castle.ActiveRecord\Framework\Queries\SimpleQuery.Generic.cs:line 104 at Bionet.Db.Varianta.CalculCumulat(VariantaCond o) in d:\Development\Server\Bionet.dll\Hql\Bll\Varianta.cs:line 126 at BioBusiness.Test.frmTest.btnTestFunctie_Click(Object sender, EventArgs e) in D:\Development\Server\BioBusiness.Test rmTest.cs:line 179
